# og-form-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                 | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |                             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | The label for the form item | `string`  | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                  | Description                                              | Default Value |
| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `--og-form-item__body-Background`     | Background of the form item container (shorthand values) | - |
| `--og-form-item__body-Padding`        | Padding of the form item container (shorthand values)    | - |
| `--og-form-item__label-Color`         | Text color of the label                                  | --OG-COLOR-SHADE--100--50 |
| `--og-form-item__label-Color--active` | Text color of the label when selected                    | --OG-COLOR-PRIMARY--100 |
| `--og-form-item__label-Color--hover`  | Text color of the label when hovered                     | --OG-COLOR-SHADE--100--50 |
| `--og-form-item__label-FontSize`      | Font size of the label                                   | - |
| `--og-form-item__label-Left`          | Left position of the label                               | - |
| `--og-form-item__label-Top`           | Top position of the label                                | - |
